headline: Nasdaq Market Whiplash: 3 Stocks to Buy Hand Over Fist and Hold for Decades
summary: Only a few days ago, the Nasdaq was in a bear market (down 20%-plus from recent all-time highs).  What should investors who are experiencing Nasdaq market whiplash do now?  Alphabet is now quite reasonably valued with a price-to-earnings-to-growth (PEG) ratio of 1.04, based on data from LSEG.
